√dih 'smear'

present: [2.] degdhi etc. V.+  déhat  digdhe  

perfect: didihe  dideha  

aorist: [1.] adehi   -- [3.] adīdihat   -- [4.] adigdha   -- [7.] adhikṣus  adhikṣat  ṣata  

[future: dhekayati  dhekayate  degdhā  ]

verbal: digdhá AV.+  -dihya S.+  

secondary: passive: dihyate etc.   -- intensive: dedih-   -- desiderative: didhikṣa-   -- causative: dehayati  dehayate E.+  

derivatives: -dih  -degha B.  deha B.+  dehī́ RV.  dehikā C.  -dehya C.  dehalī S.+
